item.title: Centos_install_bat_a_better_cat
item.author: Author
item.description: install in centos 1 2 3 4 5 #!/bin/sh URL=https://github.com/sharkdp/bat/releases/download/v0.18.1/bat-v0.18.1-x86_64-unknown-linux-musl.tar.gz wget -c -O bat.tar.gz $URL; tar -xvzf bat.tar.gz -C /usr/local; ln -s /usr/local/bat-v0.18.1-x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/bat /usr/local/bin/bat
